dmca.title: Google DMCA Hilton
dmca.body:
Image Received: 
Subject: Google DMCA Hilton
From: "Shantal Rands" 
*Via email only to **amac@google.com and **removals@google.com*

* *

October 7, 2006     1:35 PM (California Time)



Subject: *Signature on File*



From: *Jim Salomon* (email: *jim@jimsalomon.cz*)

          C/o Joseph P. Costa (SBN: 1303131) and Darius Anthony Vosylius
(SBN: 175030)

          COSTA, ABRAMS, and COATE, LLP

          1221 Second Street, Third Floor

          Santa Monica, CA 90401

          (310) 576-6161



*To: Mr. Alex Macgillivray*
       Intellectual Property Counsel

       Google, Inc.

*   *Attn: Google Legal Support, Copyright Complaints* *

*       *1600 Amphitheatre Parkway

       Mountain View, CA 94043



*Re: Salomon v. Net Management Services, et al./Copyright Violations*

*       United States District Court, Central District of **California*

*       Case No. CV 04-1553*



       *Salomon v. LFP Broadcasting,** et al./Copyright Violations*

*       United States District Court, Central District of **California*

*       Case No. CV 05-8603*



       *XPays v. Internet Commerce,** et al./Copyright Violations*

*       United States District Court, Central District of **California*

*       Case No. CV 06-5688*





Dear Alex:



This is a *Signature on File* follow up to: the Paul S. Berra, Esq. of
Lavely & Singer letter to you of March 16, 2004 (in numerous prior emails to
you, I've already attached copies) *as a result of which Google reportedly
removed something like 23 URL's*; the Joseph P. Costa, Esq. of Costa, Abrams
& Coate LLP letter to you of May 28, 2004 (in numerous prior emails to you,
I've already attached signed copies) *as a result of which Google reportedly
removed something like 41 URL's*; *my letter to **David** C. Drummond, **Miriam
Rivera and you of November 15, 2005; and my letters to you of November 29,
2005, December 7, 2005, December 12, 2005, December 14, 2005, December 22,
2005, January 2, 2006, January 3, 2006, January 11, 2006, January 16, 2006,
January 29, 2006, February 2, 2006, February 17, 2006, February 20, 2006,
February 21, 2006, February 25, 2006, February 27, 2006, March 2, 2006,
March 11, 2006, March 20, 2006, March 21, 2006, March 22, 2006, March 23,
2006, March 24, 2006, March 27, 2006, March 29, 2006, April 8, 2006, April
9, 2006, April 12, 2006, April 13, 2006, May 4, 2006, May 9, 2006, May 14,
2006, May 15, 2006, May 17, 2006,  May 21, 2006, June 19, 2006, June 28,
2006, July 4, 2006, July 17, 2006, July 23, 2006, July 25, 2006, August 1,
2006, and September 12, 2006.* In numerous prior emails to you, I've already
attached copies of the first two signed court-stamped above-referenced
United States District Court complaints. Please find attached hereto the
third signed court-stamped above-referenced United States District Court
complaint* [the attached complaint was filed on **September 11, 2006**].*





*Visible URL*:* **www.shooshtime.com/clips/video.php?id=6401*

*Destination URL*: *http://www.shooshtime.com/clips/video.php?id=6401*





*I await your expeditious email response. Thank you!*





cc: Joseph P. Costa, Esq. (via e-mail)

      Darius Anthony Vosylius, Esq. (via e-mail)

      Paul S. Berra, Esq. (via e-mail)

      Michael Landau, Esq. (via e-mail)

      Mr. Evan Horowitz (via e-mail)

      Mr. Richard Salomon (via e-mail)
